item.title: Scuba Diving community
item.description: ‚úà This is community is dedicated to providing fellow divers a forum to share their dive adventures, experiences, photos & videos. See more‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
‚úà This is community is dedicated to providing fellow divers a forum to share their dive adventures, experiences, photos & videos.

Scuba Diving community

Feedback on your diving experiences could help others in the group. Need a buddy for a dive trip? Ask the group! If you have questions on anything related to diving, travel, gear/equipment, spearfishing, lobstering, shark encounters, cave diving, tech classes, dive operations, editing, photography or videography, feel free to ask the group!

Diving Jobs All Around The World

Diving Jobs, latest Divemaster and Scuba Dive Instructor Job offers!

We LoveScuba ‚ù§Ô∏èüòéüëåüèΩ

Our community has been created for those who Scuba and for those who wish to take up Scuba. The goal is to have an open forum where we can exchange ideas and share our experiences and reviews. We hope to hear from you all soon!

See more info: https://unidiving.com/
